Senate decision
 




Ray Emery, Crosby cross paths one final time.  (Getty Images)



    

    

      
      So much for Sidney Crosby's 
      Penguins. Ottawa eliminates Pittsburgh with a 3-0 victory 
      in Game 5 to claim the first-round series 4-1. Dany Heatley, Antoine 
      Vermette and Chris Kelly score second-period goals.

 Miller: Young Diamondbacks gems prepared to sparkle?

who get high on the sweet smell of potential. But
